genes.info: pathogenic variant associated with spinal muscular atrophy (sma).
common polymorphism with no significant cardiac disease association.
pathogenic variant associated with age-related macular degeneration (amd).
pathogenic variant leading to duchenne muscular dystrophy (dmd).
frequent activating mutation found in gastrointestinal stromal tumors (gist).
pathogenic variant associated with breast and ovarian cancer.
